comment.author: 7713623@N08
comment._content: Indian Head is believed to have had the most grain elevators of any Saskatchewan community - there were apparently 12, along with a flour mill.

comment.author: 12343930@N00
comment._content: There were 13 Elevators...It was considered the Largest Grain Shipping point in the World at one time....Now there are two Wooden Elevators & One Concrete Elevator...All owned by Paterson Grain.. Dan in Beautiful Historic Indian Head, Saskatchewan.  Est 1882

comment.author: 21996335@N04
comment._content: At one time they were going to put the Uof S here too!! Glad they didn't
